original: 原為蜀漢漢嘉郡太守。夷陵大敗後，劉備在白帝城一病不起，諸葛亮自成都急赴白帝城。黃元趁成都空虛，起兵叛亂，但隨即被鄭綽、陳曶討伐。
text: Formerly the prefect of Shuhan Hanjiajun. After the defeat of Yiling, Liu Bei could not afford to be ill in Baidi City, Zhuge Liang rushed to Baidi City from Chengdu. Huang Yuan took advantage of Chengdu's emptiness and rebelled, but was immediately attacked by Zheng Chuo and Chen Jian.
